fullText: Lincoln Center Theater's production of 'Act One' is a touching tribute to Hart's memory that succeeds in bringing his memoir vividly to life on stage.
dtliExcerpt: Lincoln Center Theater's production of 'Act One' is a touching tribute to Hart's memory that succeeds in bringing his memoir vividly to life on stage.
